ClusterCount.description: The number of shots fired simultaneously in a cluster.

BurstCount.description: The number of shots or clusters fired by a trigger pull.

BurstInterval.description: The interval, in seconds, between shots in a burst.

ColliderSize.description: The size of the projectile's collider.

Speed.description: The speed of the projectile, in game units per second.

MaxLifetime.description: Maximum lifetime, in seconds, of the projectile.

AimPointScaleFactor.description: Detected aim point distance is multiplied by this number. For example, a scale factor of 2 would mean that the aim point being at 50% of the max projectile distance is treated as 100%.

ReloadTime.description: Time in seconds to reload this weapon

BurstBeamWeaponEffect.description: Specifies a burst-fired beam weapon. Damage is interpreted as the damage the weapon should do in one burst.

ReloadTime.description: Time in seconds to reload this weapon

PreciseDuration.description: If true, duration is measured in ticks rather than seconds.

DurationTicks.description: Duration of the beam in ticks. Only applicable if PreciseDuration is true.

DurationSeconds.description: Duration of the beam in seconds. Only applicable if PreciseDuration is false.

MaxRange.description: Maximum range where the beam can do damage.

BeamWidth.description: The width of the beam's visual effect. Does not affect logical behaviour.

BeamColor.description: The color of the beam. Can be specified as a color scheme color.
